import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";const{light,text,dark}=colors;const{borderRadius}=borders;const{size}=typography;const menuItem={styleOverrides:{root:{minWidth:pxToRem(160),minHeight:"unset",padding:`${pxToRem(4.8)} ${pxToRem(16)}`,borderRadius:borderRadius.md,fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,transition:"background-color 300ms ease, color 300ms ease","&:hover, &:focus, &.Mui-selected, &.Mui-selected:hover, &.Mui-selected:focus":{backgroundColor:light.main,color:dark.main}}}};export default menuItem;
